channel.title: Haro/Larry Spice and Wolf team changes
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Haro/Larry Spice and Wolf team changes" - Wish Around the World is not required and no longer exists.

item.title: Re: Haro/Larry Spice and Wolf team changes
item.content:encoded: Yeah after i looped it required the mission again

item.title: Re: Haro/Larry Spice and Wolf team changes
item.content:encoded: I just tried on naito and you still need to do the quest. Most likely what you are running into is that fact that when the recode was done anyone with Larry or Haro was treated as though they had done Wish Around the World.

item.title: Re: Haro/Larry Spice and Wolf team changes
item.content:encoded: I can't edit pages, so someone with super powers will have to do it :)

item.title: Re: Haro/Larry Spice and Wolf team changes
item.content:encoded: Yes, i have noticed this, i thought it was wierd with one alt of mine but it appears that it is no longer needed to pair the two on a team now.

item.title: Haro/Larry Spice and Wolf team changes
item.content:encoded: As far as I can tell, the Haro + Larry team Spice and Wolf does not require the quest Wish Around the World anymore. The quest is probably gone or retasked, and the comments on the Haro, Larry, and Spice and Wolf team pages are all in error.
